original_text: Then they said, “Why do we need any more testimony? We have heard it from his own lips.”
korean_text: 그들이 이르되 어찌 더 증거를 요구하리요 우리가 친히 그 입에서 들었노라 하더라

sentences.original_text: Why do we need any more testimony?
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 더 많은 증거가 왜 필요합니까?

sentences.original_text: We have heard it from his own lips.
